headline.main: NEW ZEALAND FORCES ADD 50,000 IN YEAR; Pacific Commitments Widened -- Staff College Planned

lead_paragraph: WELLINGTON, New Zealand, Oct. 11 -- New Zealand's Army was expanded by 50,000 men last year, it was indicated by a report from the chief of the General Staff, General E. Puttick, presented to the House of Representatives today.
abstract: Apptd N Z Army staff coll commandant
snippet: WELLINGTON, New Zealand, Oct. 11 -- New Zealand's Army was expanded by 50,000 men last year, it was indicated by a report from the chief of the General Staff, General E. Puttick, presented to the House of Representatives today....

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
